channel.title: ## How Do I Change The First Option To Attack ##
channel.description:
When you right click, the top option is 'TRADE' if you're a lower level.
How do I change this so everyone is the same and everyone has the first option as 'ATTACK'.
Please help, thanks :)[br][size=1]Posted on: August 26, 2007, 04:56:52 PM[/size][hr]FFS Please can someone help?

item.title: ## How Do I Change The First Option To Attack ##
item.dc:creator: @Kid1 -Kid-
item.description:
@Kid1 wrote:

Kay, thanks … But I’m not pro, I don’t know hot to make ‘string/integer’

Read full topic

item.title: ## How Do I Change The First Option To Attack ##
item.dc:creator: @S_C_A_R_Bot S C A R Bot
item.description:
@S_C_A_R_Bot wrote:

if(p2.combatlevel >= 10) { outStream.writeByteC(0); } else { outStream.writeByteC(1); }

Go trough playerhandler and make a string or int or whateva with combatlevel …
